M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Driver
Initializes currentGame and calls the test methods
Marble - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a Marble GamePiece on the board, which make up the secret code and player guesses
Marble(String) - Constructor for class Marble
This constructor creates a marble of the given color and sets matched to false
Mastermind - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a game of Mastermind with 10 turns
Mastermind() - Constructor for class Mastermind
This constructor creates the secret code using a Random object and a for-loop and initializes secretColorCount.
Mastermind(long) - Constructor for class Mastermind
This constructor creates the secret code using a Random object based on the given seed and a for-loop and initializes secretColorCount.
matches(GamePiece) - Method in class GamePiece
This method checks if the color of other matches the color of this GamePiece
messageBox - Variable in class GUI
